attributes.action: Put in support for disabled parents, end the discrimination by social services
attributes.additional_details: I’ve been through so much criticism because of the lack of support from services around me, I think I should campaign for parents who have been criticised for their disabilities and those who struggle that don’t get enough support from services who are meant to support parents.  SUPPORT the parents, don’t be critical.
attributes.background: I want the government to put in more support for disabled single parents instead of social services discriminating against us parents, so children have a chance to stay with their parents regardless of what disability their parents have

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
	
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do to provide more support to disabled parents. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, which would help support disabled parents.
